entry.title: About me
entry.content:
Welcome to Paul Tu's Homepage

I'm Paul Tu. I'm now a MS Analytics student in USC.

I got my bachelor's degree of statistics in UIC.

I am interested and experienced in data analysis, especially machine learning. I can fluently use R, Python, MySQL, SPSS, MS Office. And I tried some programming with MATLAB and Julia. I am familiar with popular used machine learning techniques: Linear Regression, LASSO, Logistic Regression, Tree Models(CART, Random Forest, GBDT), SVM, KNN, K-means, Hierarchical Clustering, PCA, FA, Bagging, Boosting and so on.

I have posted some of my codes on my Github. Feel free to see the projects listed in this website.
